name: Banana + Coconut Shampoo
use: Completely saturate your hair with warm water. Squirt a small amount of shampoo into the palm of your hand. Apply it to your scalp and massage. Rinse your hair and scalp completely.
des: A juice cleanse for your hair, this nourishing shampoo gently cleanses hair without stripping away natural oils, giving your hair it's much needed vitamins.

name: Matcha + Apple Shampoo
use: Completely saturate your hair with warm water. Squirt a small amount of shampoo into the palm of your hand. Apply it to your scalp and massage. Rinse your hair and scalp completely.
des: A nutrient rich, green juice inspired shampoo that hydrates dry hair and replenishes dull, lifeless strands with daily nourishment for healthy-looking hair.

name: Banana + Coconut Conditioner
use: After rinse shampoo on your hair . Squirt a small amount of conditioner into your hand. Massage it into the length of your hair, avoiding the scalp. Leave the conditioner in for about 3 minutes. Rinse your hair completely.
des: A smoothie-textured hair detox. This nutrient-rich conditioner brings life back into your strands with potent antioxidants and hair essential oils.

name: Cerasilk Styling Iron
use: Run the flat iron all the way down this section of your hair to straighten it. You should use a smooth and fluid motion to ensure the hair is being straightened evenly. Remember, don’t hold the flat iron in one place for too long.
des: This styling iron includes beveled edges so you can straighten and curl with no creases. Clip on the removable comb attachment to mimic the stylist comb method.

name: Anti-Static Flat Iron
use: Turn your flat iron on and wait for it to heat up. If you have a lot of thick hair, put your flat iron on a higher heat setting. If your hair is dry and brittle, have it on the lowest heat setting to prevent any further damage.
des: The long 1' floating plates are perfect for straightening or curling your hair. With 6 individual heat settings up to 410°F high heat and digital controls.

name: Copper + Ceramic Flat Iron
use: When you begin to straighten your hair, place the flat iron as close to the roots as possible. For an even result, place the flat iron an inch from your scalp.
des: Featuring an optional slide-on smoothing attachment with snag-free bristles, hair is distributed evenly across the plate for better control, glide and one-pass styling.

name: Hair Steamer Heating Cap

name: Turbo Ionic Ceramic Dryer

name: Tourmaline Ionic Dryer
use: Many of us don't know how to use a hairdryer correctly for hair styling. We just set it to the maximum temperature, and we use a round brush to run it all over our heads. That does not serve any purpose, as the hair is exposed to high heat and is not properly styled. Gently dry your hair and maintain the correct distance. Start close to the base of the neck and function in tiny parts. You may use clips, if you want, to divide your hair.
des: Black tourmaline and ceramic technology create negative ions that give hair a smoother, healthier finish.

name: T3 Proi Hair Dryer
use: Hold the hair dryer at least 6 inches from your hair. This keeps you from burning (or over-drying) the hair cuticle and also gives you the space to direct your hair the way you want it to go.
des: A state-of-the-art professional dryer that combines exceptional power, performance and salon-perfect results.

name: Head Spa Steamer
use: The first tip is that you should always use distilled water with your hair steamer. Next up you should always make sure that the water tank or jar is full before use.  Most tabletop steamers will give you around 20 minutes of use before they run out, and standalone steamers will give you between 40-60 minutes of usage on a full tank
